body:
Comment 8: 
Also, the tests attached to CL http://golang.org/cl/6450091 are still not fixed:

package p

func bar() byte {
      var a, b, x, y, z byte = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
      result := x - y*(z+(-a)*(-b))
      return result
}

func bar2() int8 {
      var a, b, c, d, e, f int8 = 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1
      result := f * (int8(a)*(b+c*d) - e)
      return result
}
